snippet.title: Super Avalanche Protips with Billy Wilcox
snippet.description:
VOTE ON STEAM GREENLIGHT
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=158613297

PLAY THE FREE DEMO
http://www.superavalanche.com/

Professional life coach Billy Wilcox recently swung by the Midnight City studio to give his protips for Avalanche 2: Super Avalanche. He was a little confused about this exciting endless platformer, but we think his tips apply to most life situations.

Learn more about the game at:
http://www.superavalanche.com/

Published by:
http://www.midnight-city.com/

Follow us on twitter:
Midnight City - http://twitter.com/Midnight_City
Beast Games - https://twitter.com/BeastGames

Like us on facebook:
Midnight City - http://facebook.com/midnightcitygames

Directed by:
Vito Gesualdi

Starring:
Vito Gesualdi

Thanks to:
Paula Morales

Music:
Disco Con Tutti by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
